metadata.synopsis: The party comes across a trio of goblins who've captured a gnome and have turned to tormenting him - they've tied him to an windmill and are watching him spin around. Here, the player approaches while using wildshape (they're in animal form, so the scene unfolds in a shortened manner that quickly turns to combat).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game with a druid and level up (Ctrl-shift-L on the character)2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Debug BookGoto region > Act 1 > Forest > Abandoned Village4. Kill combat5. Head towards the windmill up the stairs.6. Morph into any wildshape.7. Talk to Fezzerk (Goblin with great axe)

1.speaker: Fezzerk
1.text: What's this? Local wildlife havin' a gawk?
